trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 控制項中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>，您存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> uses standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> methods to manipulate the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>使用標準<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A>管理集合的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific property value exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>方法，以判斷特定屬性值是否存在集合中。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法，以判斷任何索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件在集合中的。

trans-unit.source: Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 永遠建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件，並將其新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>加入之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 當您將加入空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>的有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值加入集合中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>自動為您產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，發生例外狀況會擲回您嘗試加入新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件具有重複<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints information about each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列印每個資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a column style to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將資料行樣式加入至集合中。

trans-unit.source: The index of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates several <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and adds each to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> of two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立數個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件，並將每個要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>物件。

trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合中之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of column style objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將資料行樣式物件陣列加入集合中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects, and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the array to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立的陣列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.AddRange%2A>方法可加入至陣列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 清除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> contains a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> 是否含有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.target: 與需要之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> 是否包含與指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 相關的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合含有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for a specific column.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>至<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>特定資料行。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>方法來判斷特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>之前叫用存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A>方法移除項目。

trans-unit.target: 取得指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> or -1 if no corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> 以零起始的索引，如果不存在對應的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />，則以 -1 為起始。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>方法來判斷特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>存在。

trans-unit.source: If so, and you need the index of the element within the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，您需要使用集合中項目的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a given <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>方法來判斷給定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>存在於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If so, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method returns the index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method is invoked with the index to remove the element from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果是這樣，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法傳回的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A>索引從集合移除項目會叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 中指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> is created using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>使用建立<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> can be returned using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.PropertyDescriptor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>使用傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.PropertyDescriptor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> for a specific data source, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>針對特定資料來源，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for a specific column.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>至<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>特定資料行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> from a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, and then passes it as an argument to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例取得<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>從<xref:System.Data.DataTable>中<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，然後將它做為引數傳送至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 要傳回之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法來判斷集合中的任何項目索引。

trans-unit.source: The column header of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> can be set explicitly by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 資料行標頭的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>可以藉由設定明確設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> is set using uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A>設定使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The comparison between column headers and the value to look for is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 資料行標頭和要尋找的值之間的比較不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> named in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>中名為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Item%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的項目清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> containing the collection items.
trans-unit.target: 包含集合項目的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data event.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.CollectionChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> 中移除。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>方法，以判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>存在於集合中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> with the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將有指定索引的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> 中移除。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>方法，以判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>存在於集合中。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法來判斷集合中的任何項目索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a given <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>方法來判斷給定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>存在於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If so, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method returns the index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method is invoked with the index to remove the element from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果是這樣，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法傳回的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A>索引從集合移除項目會叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> for each column style in the collection to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 將集合中的每個資料行樣式的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from collection.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，是從集合複製的元素之目的端。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中以零為起始的索引，而且複製會從該位置開始。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 將集合複製至相容的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> (從目標陣列的指定索引處開始)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> 中的項目數大於從 <paramref name="index" /> 到 <paramref name="array" /> 結尾之間的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> 的型別不可自動轉型 (Cast) 為 <paramref name="array" /> 的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合所包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中所包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示對 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用以同步存取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用來同步存取集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合的列舉程式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The index at which the value has been added.
trans-unit.target: 要在該處加入值的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 無法將 <paramref name="value" /> 轉型為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 清除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中找出的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an element is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷項目是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目位於集合中則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中找出的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的物件在集合中第一個出現的符合項目之索引 (此索引以零為起始)。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the <paramref name="value" /> parameter within the collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是 <paramref name="value" /> 參數在集合內第一個出現的符合項目之索引 (此索引以零起始)，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 應該插入 <c>value</c> 之以零啟始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要插入集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示集合的大小是否是固定的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得位在指定索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引上的項目。

trans-unit.source: An operation attempts to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 作業嘗試設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> 中移除。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 無法將 <paramref name="value" /> 轉型為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> at the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 移除指定之索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />。
